title: Bring `gap` property to flexbox
body: As outlined in the linked issue, having the ability to use grid-gap on flexbox (which is soon to be renamed just "gap" by the CSS Working Group because "grid-gap" doesn't make sense when used on flexbox) solves a major pain point that developers are facing.

comments.body: Yes! Support for "gap" in flexbox would be swell.

More details in this issue as well:
https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/issues/1696
